meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tahne Aarnes Cecilia Cuevas Carlos Ross Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6724.

div.div: Audience marriage proposal: John and Sahar.

td.p: Tahne Aarnes, a business intelligence consultant from Chaska, Minnesota
Cecilia Cuevas, a high school dean of students from Kansas City, Missouri
Carlos Ross, a customer service representative from Austin, Texas (whose 2-day cash winnings total $64,601)

tr.td: WOMEN IN HISTORY
ANIMATED MOVIES BY CHARACTER
(Alex: Yes, there is a magazine of that name.)
THEY GAVE ME A MEDAL
DESERT LIFE
"SIX" PACK
